name: hashnode-starter-kit
description: An OSS Starter Kit to roll out frontends using Hashnode Public APIs

scripts.build: pnpm -C packages/blog-starter-kit/themes/personal install --frozen-lockfile && pnpm -C packages/blog-starter-kit/themes/personal build && rm -rf .next && mkdir -p .next/standalone && cp -R packages/blog-starter-kit/themes/personal/.next/standalone/* .next/standalone/ && cp -R packages/blog-starter-kit/themes/personal/.next/static .next/static && node scripts/make-standalone-entry.js
